name: RetrieveLegalHoldInfo
description:
Retrieve information about a legal hold in an organization's case.

Use this tool to get details about a legal hold in a specific case within an organization, requiring organization:cases:management scope and applicable for Enterprise Guard users with specific admin roles.

parameters.name: organization_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the organization for which to retrieve legal hold data.

value_schema.description: The ID of the organization for which you want to retrieve the legal hold information.

parameters.name: case_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the case to retrieve the legal hold information.

value_schema.description: The ID of the case for which you want to retrieve the legal hold information.

parameters.name: legal_hold_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the legal hold to be retrieved.

value_schema.description: The ID of the legal hold you want to retrieve.
